relics.name: Order Pad
relics.description: Right Click to buy a random uncommon rarity relic for 150 gold.

relics.name: Metal Upa
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 3 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: The name "Mayushii!" is written on the bottom.

relics.name: Timewalking Pendant
relics.description: Every 32 Cards you play, Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn.
relics.flavorText: Anachronic Eternity in the palm of your hand.

relics.name: Adamantium
relics.description: Replaces Orichalcum. If you end your turn without Block, gain 9 Block.
relics.flavorText: A pink tinted metal from a two dimensional world. Seems indestructable.

relics.name: Happy Flowers
relics.description:
Replaces Happy Flower.
RESETS YOUR COUNTER.
Every 3 turns, gain [E] [E]
relics.flavorText: Happiness is best shared with others.

relics.name: Lunar Clock
relics.description: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Upon Pickup, set your run timer to -2:00. Dealing damage rewinds time by half the damage dealt. Taking damage fast-fowards the timer by Triple the amount taken. When the timer reaches 0, you lose.
relics.flavorText: A small pocket watch originally belonging to a maiden. Holding it makes time distort around you.

relics.name: Memoir of the Literature Club
relics.description:
Start each combat with an additional [E]
The connection between worlds makes the Spire distort every 3 turns.
Distortions can help or hinder you.
relics.flavorText: Thank you for being a part of the Literature Club!.

relics.name: Menacing Aura
relics.description: At the start of every combat, gain 5 Strength. All Enemies gain 3 Strength and Gain 5% Max HP

relics.name: Rainbow in the Dark
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Frost, 1 Lightning and 1 Dark
relics.flavorText: You've been left on your own, like a rainbow in the dark.

relics.name: The Sun
relics.description: Right Click: Destroy this relic and Stun a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A small orb, powering the colossal, ever-beating heart of the world.

relics.name: Legendary Shield
relics.description:
Whenever you would receive more than 7 unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 7.
Whenever you would receive less than 7 unblocked attack damage, increase it to 7.
relics.flavorText: I'll defend this world on my own!

keywords.name: Sanctuary:Exhaustion
keywords.description:
When you would die, revive with 100% of your Max HP,
clear your debuffs and gain Exhaustion instead.
You give up if Exhaustion would reach 3.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:Fuse
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:Overheat
keywords.description: This effect triggers if you have died this combat.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:Spell Card
keywords.description: You can only play up to 3 Spell Cards per turn.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:Spell Fragment
keywords.description: Collect five Fragments to unleash a powerful Spell Card attack.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:Volatile Flame
keywords.description: Your flame is volatile and frequent to change.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:burst
keywords.description: This effect triggers if the last card played was an Attack.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:ignite
keywords.description:
Ignited creatures lose 1 Strength and Increment your own Strength by 1 at the end of the monster's turn.
Ignited creatures also increment your sanctuary:Volatile_Flame by  at the end of the monsters' turn.
Each turn, creatures with Ignited have this power's amount reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Sanctuary:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
